text: DYVW (1386 AM) is a radio station owned and operated by the Voice of the Word Media Network, the media arm of the Diocese of Borongan. The station's studio is located along Baybay Blvd., Brgy. Songco, Borongan.LTO continues to advocate Road SafetyPutting Faith in the Net, Church Plans to Wire Philippine VillagesDiocese of BoronganThe social relevance of Church-owned radio Last June 26, 2018, DYVW was reopened after 13 years off the air.Borongan diocese reopens radio station after 13-year closure ==References== Category:Radio stations established in 1991 Category:Catholic radio stations Category:Radio stations in Eastern Samar
title: DYVW
